steps.title: Enemy at the Gate - Get Caustic Arrow
steps.description: Get Caustic Arrow reward from quest completion

reward.name: Caustic Arrow
reward.usage_notes: Good early clear until Poisonous Concoction. Link with Pierce Support when available.

steps.gear_focus: Look for green sockets for bow skills

steps.title: Mercy Mission - Get Chance to Poison
steps.description: Get Chance to Poison reward and purchase support gems

reward.name: Chance to Poison
reward.usage_notes: Support for early skills. Essential for poison builds.

vendor.name: Mirage Archer Support
vendor.usage_notes: Excellent support for any bow skill - creates a clone that continues attacking.

vendor.name: War Banner
vendor.usage_notes: First aura. Store charges from kills, release for Adrenaline buff on tough fights.

steps.title: Breaking Some Eggs - Get Movement Skill
steps.description: Get Dash reward and purchase Shrapnel Ballista

reward.name: Dash
reward.usage_notes: Primary movement skill until Smoke Mine.

vendor.name: Shrapnel Ballista
vendor.usage_notes: Single target supplement. Place totem for additional DPS.

steps.title: The Siren's Cadence - Get Poisonous Concoction
steps.description: Get Poisonous Concoction and transition to main skill

reward.name: Poisonous Concoction
reward.usage_notes: Main Skill. Requires empty main hand (unequip bow, equip shield). Scales with Life Flask charges.

vendor.name: Withering Step
vendor.usage_notes: Instant skill to apply Withered debuff, increasing chaos damage taken.

vendor.name: Volley Support
vendor.usage_notes: Better than LMP for clear - higher projectile damage modifier.

vendor.name: Smoke Mine
vendor.usage_notes: Replaces Dash. Better movement skill with blind effect.

steps.gear_focus: Unequip bow, equip shield. Look for life and resistances.
steps.currency_notes: Keep Life Flasks updated for Poisonous Concoction scaling

steps.title: Sharp and Cruel - Get Void Manipulation

reward.name: Void Manipulation
reward.usage_notes: Core support for poison builds - MORE chaos damage.

steps.gear_focus: Continue looking for life and resistance gear

steps.title: Intruders in Black - Get Herald of Agony

reward.name: Herald of Agony
reward.usage_notes: Aura for more poison damage. 10% MORE damage with poison.

steps.title: Lost in Love - Get Plague Bearer

reward.name: Plague Bearer
reward.usage_notes: Store poison damage for AoE clear. Toggle on/off to release stored damage.

steps.title: The Eternal Nightmare - Get Greater Volley

reward.name: Greater Volley Support
reward.usage_notes: Key support for clear. More projectiles for better coverage.

steps.gear_focus: Focus on life and chaos resistance
